FuncDef: The upgrade sfu by-testbus command upgrades the single EPLD logic or all the systems on the specified SFU.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot list of the SFU. You can specify one slot or multiple slots at a time.
The value is a string of 1 to 30.

Indicates using the current startup system software to upgrade the device.
-

Specifies the file name of the system software stored in the CF card using an absolute path.
The value is a string of 4 to 127 characters without spaces.

Examples: *                     W A R N I N G                     *
* Please ensure that the configuration has been saved.  *
* And please ensure that the board does not be powered  *
* off or be reseted during the upgrade operation.       *
* Also ensure that any board of this device is not      *
* removed (pull out or plug in) during this process.    *
*                     W A R N I N G                     *
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the SFU cannot be registered, you can upgrade it through testbus. Ensure that the board is loaded with the right electronic label.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
